Introduction

Zhong Chenle is a Chinese singer based in South Korea. Chenle is best known as a member of the boy group NCT and the main vocalist of its sub-unit NCT Dream.

Chenle is notable for only having to be trained for two months. Aside from singing, Chenle is also great at dancing and can even play the piano.
